Package jv.viewer

Viewer package of JavaView handles all 3d drawing, manages the control window and loading of projects.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PvDisplayCanvasIf
    Interface for several types of canvas objects to serve inside a JavaView display.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PvCamera
    Camera provides transformation matrices to project a scene into a given target image of given size.
    PvCamera_IP
    Info panel of all cameras of a JavaView AWT display.
    PvControlMenu
    Menu bar of control window, created from inside PvControl.
    PvDisplay
    Display of JavaView for viewing and interaction with 3d geometries.
    PvDisplay_IP
    Info panel of display.
    PvGeometry
    Container class for display.
    PvLight
    Light for JavaView display.
    PvLight_IP
    Info panel used by all lights of a scene.
    PvScene
    Container class for display.
    PvScenegraph
    Gui canvas showing a tree-based explorer view.
    PvViewer
    Manages the 3d-display, control window, and list of projects.

Package jv.viewer Description

Viewer package of JavaView handles all 3d drawing, manages the control window and loading of projects. The three main classes are PvDisplay for displaying geometry in a 3d canvas, the control panel with menus, buttons, and inspector panels, and the viewer manager PvViewer which organizes displays, controls, and projects. PvViewer is the viewer manager and should be created in each applet as one of the first activities.
